TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UserScopedSettingAttribute extends System.Configuration.SettingAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class UserScopedSettingAttribute Inherits SettingAttribute
public ref class UserScopedSettingAttribute sealed : System::Configuration::SettingAttribute

summary.span: 指定應用程式設定群組或屬性，其包含應用程式之每個使用者的不同值。

span.span: Specifies that an application settings group or property contains distinct values for each user of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式設定屬性具有在應用程式或使用者層級為基礎的範圍。Application settings properties have a scope that is based either at the application or the user level. 如分類所暗示，應用程式範圍屬性則會顯示統一的值給所有使用者的應用程式，而使用者範圍的屬性具有專用應用程式的每個使用者的值。As the categories imply, application-scoped properties present uniform values to all users of the application, whereas user-scoped properties have dedicated values for each user of the application. 表示屬性應該視為使用者層級設定，而且適當的儲存體的決策都應該據此進行設定提供者。The indicates that a property should be considered a user level setting, and that appropriate storage decisions should be made accordingly by the settings provider. 需要為每個應用程式設定屬性的領域屬性。A scope attribute is required for each application settings property. 如果屬性不會套用與或，設定提供者會忽略此屬性，它便不會序列化。If a property is not applied with either a or , the property is ignored by the settings provider—it is not serialized. 是無效的不過，若要將這兩個屬性套用至相同的設定屬性。It is invalid, however, to apply both attributes to the same settings property. 這類的嘗試會導致擲回。Such an attempt will cause a to be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用套用至所有的四個屬性的`FormSettings`包裝函式類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the applied to all four properties of the `FormSettings` wrapper class, which is derived from the class. 這個類別用來保存位置、 大小、 背景色彩和表單的文字。This class is used to persist the location, size, background color, and text of form. 完整的程式碼範例會列在類別概觀。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#9)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個應用程式設定屬性必須套用具有單一領域屬性，才能讓它要辨識及序列化設定提供者。Each application settings property must be applied with a single scope attribute in order for it to be recognized and serialized by the settings provider.
